name: 哈利亚·阿卜杜勒-梅吉德
name_full: 哈利亚·阿卜杜勒-梅吉德 Halia Abdel-Meguid
introduction: Halia Abdel-Meguid is a screenwriter based out of Los Angeles. A native of New York City, she trained as an actress and musician in London. She has built up a strong fan base as a singer and guitar player, providing solo vocals on the BBC science fiction television series "Doctor Who" since 2011, and created original music content for the NBC series "Hannibal" in 2014. Halia's written work focuses on the fantastical, the macabre, the long-forgotten, and the unexpected. She is a 2018 graduate of the American Film Institute.
